message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your offer, the value of this product is quite high.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about we try $10,250? I'm really interested in this product, but I have to stay within my budget.
